OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD, ROTHERHAM AND DISTRICT COUNCIL OF MUSLIMS

Desc.entry: The objectives of the Muslim Council are to promote and develop Islamic education, co-ordinate the activities of the Muslim community and do such things which will help in the social, cultural, educational and religious development of the Muslims in Sheffield, Rotherham and its districts. The Muslim Council is a non-political and non-profit-making organisation.

ContactName.entry: Mr M S Malik, Chair/Mr Mukhtar Tufail

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
